channel.title: Settings for run_client help plz
channel.description:
well im having trouble when i send my client to a friend this is what is in my run_client: @echo off java -classpath build;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/jmf.jar;lib/junit.jar;lib/mina.jar;lib/slf4j; org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause
and the error that i get is: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/rscdaemon/client/ mudclient Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient. Program will exi t. Press any key to continue . . .
any help would be greatly appreciated im using EASYRSC v1 by xent

item.title: Settings for run_client help plz
item.dc:creator: @dizzle11 dizzle11
item.description:
@dizzle11 wrote:

thx adu that was the problem +100 to u man

Read full topic

item.title: Settings for run_client help plz
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Alright, in your run client you have:

@echo off java -classpath build;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/jmf.jar;lib/junit.jar;lib/mina.jar;lib/slf4j; org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause

This means that when you run your client, it it trying to get the main-class from the folder named “build” then org.rscdaemon…

If you change your run client to:

@echo off java -classpath rscd.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/jmf.jar;lib/junit.jar;lib/mina.jar;lib/slf4j; org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause

This will try to search for the mail-class in the file “rscd.jar” then org.rscdaemon…

Read full topic

item.title: Settings for run_client help plz
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

set your ant and java paths exactly right in your compile, if you still cant get it just play around with it, until it compiles, the reason your friend cant get on is because there are no class files in the client.
